colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(CES PADMA DBANG CHEN KHRAG 'THUNG RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI GZHUNG DANG 'BREL BAR GDAB LAS KYI RIM PA LAG TU BLANG BA'I CHO GA BSGRIGS RTA MCHOG RNGAMS PA'I BZHAD SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG DANG GZHAN GYI LAG LEN DU NYER MKHOR MTHONG NAS, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS LAS GSUNG 'JIGS MED RDO RJE'I SGRA DBYANGS SU GSUNGS PA LA GZHI BYAS, ZER MI GSAL BA 'GA' ZHIG BEE RO'I SBAS PA MIG 'BYED DANG MUS SPANG PA YAB SRAS KYI GSUNG RNAMS LAS KHA BSKANGS SHING, SPROM DON DANG MTHUN PA'I 'KHRUG BSDEBS ZHUNG BRAD DANG BCAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN LAS 'DI SKOR GYI MAN NGAG DMAR KHRID PHYAG BZHES DANG BCAS PA LEGS PAR THOB PA'I RIG SNGAGS 'DZIN PA'I GZUGS BRNYAN, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAM ZHAR 'KHYER BDE BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GROR YONGS LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG ,DZA YANTU,, ,,)
